input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Northlight Madison Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Vickerman Kiana Flocked Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 18' Pre-Lit LED Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 6' x 9" Pre-Lit Decorated Frosted Pine Cone and Berries Artificial'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit Artificial Tinsel Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 27' x 20" Green Artificial Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9" Prelit LED Magnolia Mix Pine Garland with Bow and Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 6" Decorated Black Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Cool White LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9 ft.'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Madison Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a pine artificial Christmas garland similar in type and function, though 'Madison Pine' variant might differ in branch types or decorations; no info on lighting.
It is a Christmas garland but flocked (snowy effect), which differs from the pine and natural look. No info on pre-lit feature.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 18' Pre-Lit LED Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine artificial garland similar in key features including lighting, pine needles, and function. Longer length but highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6' x 9" Pre-Lit Decorated Frosted Pine Cone and Berries Artificial
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit and decorated pine garland but frosted and includes berries which may differ in aesthetic; still close in function and type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit Artificial Tinsel Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tinsel garland is quite different in material and look, despite being pre-lit; functionally different from pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 27' x 20" Green Artificial Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Green artificial pine Christmas garland aligns in silhouette and use, but no mention of pre-lit feature reduces relevance somewhat.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9" Prelit LED Magnolia Mix Pine Garland with Bow and Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit garland with warm white LED by same brand, mixed pine with magnolia and bow, suggesting some variation but comparable function and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 6" Decorated Black Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Cool White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Decorated black pine garland with cool white LED lights, similar length and features with some difference in LED color and pine type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical brand and product category, pre-lit artificial Christmas garland likely very similar or same product line.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Matches base branch type 'Norwood Fir' and length; same brand; no explicit mention of pre-lit but otherwise closely aligned.
